function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of COVID-19 via respiratory droplets,"},{"Impact":"Increased risk of transmission especially in close proximity","Mitigation":"Maintain social distancing, wear masks, and improve ventilation systems","Technologies":"Improved air filtration and ventilation systems","People":"General public, healthcare workers, and individuals in close contact with infected persons","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Transmission of COVID-19 via fomites or surfaces","Impact":"Increased risk of indirect transmission in indoor environments","Mitigation":"Frequent cleaning and sanitization of surfaces, use of antimicrobial materials, and promoting hand hygiene","Technologies":"UV-C light disinfection systems, antimicrobial coatings","People":"General public, facility management personnel","Owner":"Facility management companies, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Underestimation of modes of transmission","Impact":"Increased spread of the virus due to lack of awareness and preparedness","Mitigation":"Educate the public about all potential modes of transmission, prioritize research on less understood transmission modes","Technologies":"Public health awareness campaigns, research funding for alternative transmission pathways","People":"General public, healthcare workers, researchers","Owner":"Public health agencies, government research institutions"}]}
